mapper.update: update w_coupon set coupon_name = #{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_num = #{couponNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_description = #{couponDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_user_term = #{couponUserTerm,jdbcType=DATE}, coupon_exchange_time = #{couponExchangeTime,jdbcType=DATE} where coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select coupon_id, coupon_name, coupon_num, coupon_description, coupon_user_term, coupon_exchange_time from w_coupon where coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select coupon_id, coupon_name, coupon_num, coupon_description, coupon_user_term, coupon_exchange_time from w_coupon
